original: INITIAL DISTRIBUTION PERIOD:                    April 15, 2000 through October 15, 2000 (6 Months from the Effective Date) PRODUCTS:                   The CircuiTest 2000S In-Circuit Test System The CircuiTest 2100 Scanner Expansion EXCLUSIVE TERRITORIES:      The 48 Contiguous United States EFFECTIVE DATE:             The earlier of the date Comware orders and pays for a minimum of $22,710 worth of Products, in any combination, or April 15, 2000.
ollama_generated:
INITIAL TERM OF DISTRIBUTION:              From the Effective Date, extending up to but not exceeding a period of six months thereafter, specifically from April 15, 2000 through October 15, 2000.
   PRODUCTS:                      The CircuiTest 2000S In-Circuit Test System and the CircuiTest 2100 Scanner Expansion.
   EXCLUSIVE REGIONS:       The 48 contiguous states of the United States.
   EFFECTIVE PERIOD:         Either the date when Comware places an order for a minimum total value of $22,710 in Products or on April 15, 2000; whichever comes first will be considered as the Effective Date. However, it is to be noted that the supplier's obligations hereunder shall cease upon the expiration of six months from the aforementioned effective date, regardless of whether Comware has fulfilled its minimum order requirement or not.

INITIAL PRICE ADJUSTMENTS:

To clarify the terms of this agreement, it is hereby stated that the initial prices listed for our products or services shall be subject to adjustments based on various factors at our discretion. The client may receive a discount from the original price; however, we reserve the right to modify these adjustments without prior notice, and in some instances, the price may increase rather than decrease. This provision is intended to ensure fairness and flexibility in our pricing structure while maintaining business efficiency.

original: o Use best efforts to market and sell the Products to customers.

original: o    ITS will deliver working systems no later than 30 days after a hard copy purchase order is received from COMWARE.

original: o    ITS will be solely responsible for the production of brochures describing the products, and will provide COMWARE with ample space for placement of business card/label and provide COMWARE with as many brochures as it may from time to time reasonably require, free of charge.

However, any additional requests or reprints beyond this initial provision may be subject to charges at a mutually agreed-upon rate.

original: o    ITS will use its best efforts to provide a swift and complete resolution of any product-related problems, whether or not such problems are covered under the terms of the WARRANTY. In the event that one of COMWARE'S customers has a problem that is beyond the scope of COMWARE'S capabilities, ITS will address the problem without delay in the best interest of customer service.
ollama_generated: ITS commits to addressing product-related issues diligently and comprehensively, regardless of whether they fall under the Warranty terms or not. In circumstances where a COMWARE customer encounters an issue that surpasses COMWARE's capabilities, ITS will prioritize its response, with a focus on resolving the issue promptly while ensuring customer satisfaction. This proactive approach is aimed at maintaining high-quality service for our valued customers.

original: 8.   WARRANTY:  ITS  Products  are  warranted  free from  defects of material or workmanship  for 3 years after  shipment from the  manufacturer.  Equipment purchased from ITS, which becomes defective within that time period will be repaired by ITS at its  headquarters  in San  Antonio,  Texas at no cost to COMWARE  beyond cost of shipping  the  equipment  to ITS. ITS will bear the cost of returning the item to COMWARE by UPS,  REGULAR  DELIVERY.  priority shipping costs will be borne by COMWARE.
modified: 8. WARRANTY: COMWARE acknowledges that it is responsible for the cost of priority shipping when returning equipment to ITS for repair under this warranty. ITS's Products are guaranteed free from defects in material or workmanship for a period of three years, commencing on the date of shipment from the manufacturer. Equipment purchased from ITS which becomes defective during this warranty period shall not be COMWARE's responsibility to repair; rather, it will be repaired at the discretion of ITS at its headquarters in San Antonio, Texas. Any costs associated with shipping the equipment to ITS beyond regular delivery, and any additional costs related to the return of the item to COMWARE by UPS shall be borne entirely by ITS.

original: COMWARE may purchase  additional  copies of the  documentation and software disks at then prevailing prices.

original: TERMINATION:  except as  specifically  described  elsewhere  in this  agreement, either ITS or COMWARE shall have the right to terminate this Agreement with 30 days written notice from the other party, for any reason whatsoever.
ollama_generated: TERMINATION: This Agreement may be terminated at the discretion of either party, ITS or COMWARE, upon providing a written notice of 30 days, without specifying any particular reasons for such termination. However, the other party shall retain the right to continue this agreement if they choose not to accept the termination and can demonstrate no material breach of contract on their part.
